name: Venn (Azimozi)
description:
Embark on a journey to get medicine for your seriously ill son. 

On your way you will make some new acquaintances, collect many impressions and marvel at your surroundings.

You will need to gather information from other people in order to reach your goal. But keep in mind that nothing comes for free!

Controls:

Move - WASD (Keyboards) / Left Stick (Controller)

Interact - E (Keyboard) / Square or X Button (Controller)

Tips: 

  • Try following the streetlanterns for optimal completion of the game.
  • Consider talking to every NPC, they could have important dialog.

Music and SFX:

The music and SFX used in this game are available at www.epidemicsound.com.
